alert.note: Alert for Central Walton; Coastal Bay; Holmes; Inland Bay; North Walton; South Walton; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 17 at 1:13AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Bay, Walton, southwestern Holmes and Washington Counties through 200 AM EDT/100 AM CDT/... At 112 AM EDT/1212 AM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles northeast of Vernon to 7 miles northwest of Eglin Air Force Base. Movement was southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Panama City, Lynn Haven, Panama City Beach, Callaway, Vernon, Santa Rosa Beach, De Funiak Springs, Bonifay, Springfield, Hiland Park, Eglin Air Force Base, Bradford, Live Oak, Parker, Freeport, Ponce De Leon, Wausau, Westville, Ebro and Oakwood Hills. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Walton; Coastal Bay; Holmes; Inland Bay; North Walton; South Walton; Washington
